verses.verse: This then was <WH1961> the lot <WH1486> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> by their families; <WH4940> even to <WH413> the border <WH1366> of Edom <WH123> the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> southward <WH5045> was the uttermost part <WH4480> <WH7097> of the south coast. <WH8486>
And their south <WH5045> border <WH1366> was <WH1961> from the shore <WH4480> <WH7097> of the salt <WH4417> sea, <WH3220> from <WH4480> the bay <WH3956> that looketh <WH6437> southward: <WH5045>

And it went out <WH3318> to <WH413> the south side <WH4480> <WH5045> to Maaleh-acrabbim, <WH4610> and passed along <WH5674> to Zin, <WH6790> and ascended up <WH5927> on the south side <WH4480> <WH5045> unto Kadesh-barnea, <WH6947> and passed along <WH5674> to Hezron, <WH2696> and went up <WH5927> to Adar, <WH146> and fetched a compass <WH5437> to Karkaa: <WH7173>

From thence it passed toward <WH5674> Azmon, <WH6111> and went out <WH3318> unto the river <WH5158> of Egypt; <WH4714> and the goings out <WH8444> of that coast <WH1366> were <WH1961> at the sea: <WH3220> this <WH2088> shall be <WH1961> your south <WH5045> coast. <WH1366>

And the east <WH6924> border <WH1366> was the salt <WH4417> sea, <WH3220> even unto <WH5704> the end <WH7097> of Jordan. <WH3383> And their border <WH1366> in the north <WH6828> quarter <WH6285> was from the bay <WH4480> <WH3956> of the sea <WH3220> at the uttermost part <WH4480> <WH7097> of Jordan: <WH3383>

And the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> to Beth-hogla, <WH1031> and passed along <WH5674> by the north <WH4480> <WH6828> of Beth-arabah; <WH1026> and the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> to the stone <WH68> of Bohan <WH932> the son <WH1121> of Reuben: <WH7205>

And the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> toward Debir <WH1688> from the valley <WH4480> <WH6010> of Achor, <WH5911> and so northward, <WH6828> looking <WH6437> toward <WH413> Gilgal, <WH1537> that <WH834> is before <WH5227> the going up <WH4608> to Adummim, <WH131> which <WH834> is on the south side <WH4480> <WH5045> of the river: <WH5158> and the border <WH1366> passed <WH5674> toward <WH413> the waters <WH4325> of En-shemesh, <WH5885> and the goings out <WH8444> thereof were <WH1961> at <WH413> En-rogel: <WH5883>

And the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> by the valley <WH1516> of the son <WH1121> of Hinnom <WH2011> unto <WH413> the south <WH4480> <WH5045> side <WH3802> of the Jebusite; <WH2983> the same <WH1931> is Jerusalem: <WH3389> and the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> to <WH413> the top <WH7218> of the mountain <WH2022> that <WH834> lieth before <WH5921> the valley <WH1516> of Hinnom <WH2011> westward, <WH3220> which <WH834> is at the end <WH7097> of the valley <WH6010> of the giants <WH7497> northward: <WH6828>

And the border <WH1366> was drawn <WH8388> from the top <WH4480> <WH7218> of the hill <WH2022> unto <WH413> the fountain <WH4599> of the water <WH4325> of Nephtoah, <WH5318> and went out <WH3318> to <WH413> the cities <WH5892> of mount <WH2022> Ephron; <WH6085> and the border <WH1366> was drawn <WH8388> to Baalah, <WH1173> which <WH1931> is Kirjath-jearim: <WH7157>

And the border <WH1366> compassed <WH5437> from Baalah <WH4480> <WH1173> westward <WH3220> unto <WH413> mount <WH2022> Seir, <WH8165> and passed along <WH5674> unto <WH413> the side <WH3802> of mount <WH2022> Jearim, <WH3297> which <WH1931> is Chesalon, <WH3693> on the north side, <WH4480> <WH6828> and went down <WH3381> to Beth-shemesh, <WH1053> and passed on <WH5674> to Timnah: <WH8553>

And the border <WH1366> went out <WH3318> unto <WH413> the side <WH3802> of Ekron <WH6138> northward: <WH6828> and the border <WH1366> was drawn <WH8388> to Shicron, <WH7942> and passed along <WH5674> to mount <WH2022> Baalah, <WH1173> and went out <WH3318> unto Jabneel; <WH2995> and the goings out <WH8444> of the border <WH1366> were <WH1931> at the sea. <WH3220>

And the west <WH3220> border <WH1366> was to the great <WH1419> sea, <WH3220> and the coast <WH1366> thereof. This <WH2088> is the coast <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> round about <WH5439> according to their families. <WH4940>

And unto Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312> he gave <WH5414> a part <WH2506> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Judah, <WH3063> according <WH413> to the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> to Joshua, <WH3091> even <WH853> the city <WH7151> of Arba <WH704> the father <WH1> of Anak, <WH6061> which <WH1931> city is Hebron. <WH2275>

And Caleb <WH3612> drove <WH3423> thence <WH4480> <WH8033> <WH853> the three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> of Anak, <WH6061> <WH853> Sheshai, <WH8344> and Ahiman, <WH289> and Talmai, <WH8526> the children <WH3211> of Anak. <WH6061>
And he went up <WH5927> thence <WH4480> <WH8033> to <WH413> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Debir: <WH1688> and the name <WH8034> of Debir <WH1688> before <WH6440> was Kirjath-sepher. <WH7158>

And Caleb <WH3612> said, <WH559> He that <WH834> smiteth <WH5221> <WH853> Kirjath-sepher, <WH7158> and taketh <WH3920> it, to him will I give <WH5414> <WH853> Achsah <WH5915> my daughter <WH1323> to wife. <WH802>

And Othniel <WH6274> the son <WH1121> of Kenaz, <WH7073> the brother <WH251> of Caleb, <WH3612> took <WH3920> it: and he gave <WH5414> him <WH853> Achsah <WH5915> his daughter <WH1323> to wife. <WH802>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> as she came <WH935> unto him, that she moved <WH5496> him to ask <WH7592> of <WH4480> <WH854> her father <WH1> a field: <WH7704> and she lighted <WH6795> off <WH4480> <WH5921> her ass; <WH2543> and Caleb <WH3612> said <WH559> unto her, What <WH4100> wouldest thou?

Who answered, <WH559> Give <WH5414> me a blessing; <WH1293> for <WH3588> thou hast given <WH5414> me a south <WH5045> land; <WH776> give <WH5414> me also springs <WH1543> of water. <WH4325> And he gave <WH5414> her <WH853> the upper <WH5942> springs, <WH1543> and the nether <WH8482> springs. <WH1543>
This <WH2063> is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> according to their families. <WH4940>

And the uttermost <WH4480> <WH7097> cities <WH5892> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> toward <WH413> the coast <WH1366> of Edom <WH123> southward <WH5045> were <WH1961> Kabzeel, <WH6909> and Eder, <WH5740> and Jagur, <WH3017>
And Kinah, <WH7016> and Dimonah, <WH1776> and Adadah, <WH5735>
And Kedesh, <WH6943> and Hazor, <WH2674> and Ithnan, <WH3497>
Ziph, <WH2128> and Telem, <WH2928> and Bealoth, <WH1175>
And Hazor, <WH2674> Hadattah, <WH2675> and Kerioth, <WH7152> and Hezron, <WH2696> which <WH1931> is Hazor, <WH2674>
Amam, <WH538> and Shema, <WH8090> and Moladah, <WH4137>
And Hazar-gaddah, <WH2693> and Heshmon, <WH2829> and Beth-palet, <WH1046>
And Hazarshual, <WH2705> and Beer-sheba, <WH884> and Bizjothjah, <WH964>
Baalah, <WH1173> and Iim, <WH5864> and Azem, <WH6107>
And Eltolad, <WH513> and Chesil, <WH3686> and Hormah, <WH2767>
And Ziklag, <WH6860> and Madmannah, <WH4089> and Sansannah, <WH5578>
And Lebaoth, <WH3822> and Shilhim, <WH7978> and Ain, <WH5871> and Rimmon: <WH7417> all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> are twenty <WH6242> and nine, <WH8672> with their villages: <WH2691>
And in the valley, <WH8219> Eshtaol, <WH847> and Zoreah, <WH6881> and Ashnah, <WH823>
And Zanoah, <WH2182> and En-gannim, <WH5873> Tappuah, <WH8599> and Enam, <WH5879>
Jarmuth, <WH3412> and Adullam, <WH5725> Socoh, <WH7755> and Azekah, <WH5825>
And Sharaim, <WH8189> and Adithaim, <WH5723> and Gederah, <WH1449> and Gederothaim; <WH1453> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages: <WH2691>
Zenan, <WH6799> and Hadashah, <WH2322> and Migdal-gad, <WH4028>
And Dilean, <WH1810> and Mizpeh, <WH4708> and Joktheel, <WH3371>
Lachish, <WH3923> and Bozkath, <WH1218> and Eglon, <WH5700>
And Cabbon, <WH3522> and Lahmam, <WH3903> and Kithlish, <WH3798>
And Gederoth, <WH1450> Beth-dagon, <WH1016> and Naamah, <WH5279> and Makkedah; <WH4719> sixteen <WH8337> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages: <WH2691>
Libnah, <WH3841> and Ether, <WH6281> and Ashan, <WH6228>
And Jiphtah, <WH3316> and Ashnah, <WH823> and Nezib, <WH5334>
And Keilah, <WH7084> and Achzib, <WH392> and Mareshah; <WH4762> nine <WH8672> cities <WH5892> with their villages: <WH2691>
Ekron, <WH6138> with her towns <WH1323> and her villages: <WH2691>
From Ekron <WH4480> <WH6138> even unto the sea, <WH3220> all <WH3605> that <WH834> lay near <WH5921> <WH3027> Ashdod, <WH795> with their villages: <WH2691>

Ashdod <WH795> with her towns <WH1323> and her villages, <WH2691> Gaza <WH5804> with her towns <WH1323> and her villages, <WH2691> unto <WH5704> the river <WH5158> of Egypt, <WH4714> and the great <WH1419> sea, <WH3220> and the border <WH1366> thereof:
And in the mountains, <WH2022> Shamir, <WH8069> and Jattir, <WH3492> and Socoh, <WH7755>
And Dannah, <WH1837> and Kirjath-sannah, <WH7158> which <WH1931> is Debir, <WH1688>
And Anab, <WH6024> and Eshtemoh, <WH851> and Anim, <WH6044>
And Goshen, <WH1657> and Holon, <WH2473> and Giloh; <WH1542> eleven <WH259> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages: <WH2691>
Arab, <WH694> and Dumah, <WH1746> and Eshean, <WH824>
And Janum, <WH3241> and Beth-tappuah, <WH1054> and Aphekah, <WH664>
And Humtah, <WH2547> and Kirjath-arba, <WH7153> which <WH1931> is Hebron, <WH2275> and Zior; <WH6730> nine <WH8672> cities <WH5892> with their villages: <WH2691>
Maon, <WH4584> Carmel, <WH3760> and Ziph, <WH2128> and Juttah, <WH3194>
And Jezreel, <WH3157> and Jokdeam, <WH3347> and Zanoah, <WH2182>
Cain, <WH7014> Gibeah, <WH1390> and Timnah; <WH8553> ten <WH6235> cities <WH5892> with their villages: <WH2691>
Halhul, <WH2478> Beth-zur, <WH1049> and Gedor, <WH1446>
And Maarath, <WH4638> and Beth-anoth, <WH1042> and Eltekon; <WH515> six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> with their villages: <WH2691>
Kirjath-baal, <WH7154> which <WH1931> is Kirjath-jearim, <WH7157> and Rabbah; <WH7237> two <WH8147> cities <WH5892> with their villages: <WH2691>
In the wilderness, <WH4057> Beth-arabah, <WH1026> Middin, <WH4081> and Secacah, <WH5527>
And Nibshan, <WH5044> and the city <WH5892> of Salt, <WH5898> and En-gedi; <WH5872> six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH2691>

As for the Jebusites <WH2983> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> could <WH3201> not <WH3808> drive them out: <WH3423> but the Jebusites <WH2983> dwell <WH3427> with <WH584> the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> at Jerusalem <WH3389> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>
